FuncDef: The display isis srlg command displays shared risk link group (SRLG) information. The display isis srlg command displays shared risk link group (SRLG) information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies an SRLG ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.
